name: test_create_user
description:
arrange: A discourse application
    act: Create a user
    assert: User is created, and re-creating the same user should fail
descriptionHtml:
arrange: A discourse application
act: Create a user
assert: User is created, and re-creating the same user should fail

testStage.description:
arrange: A discourse application
    act: Create a user
    assert: User is created, and re-creating the same user should fail
